translation.help_message: Press <Key1/> + <Key2/> to overlay a black background over the entire screen
translation.toggle_enableoverlay_description: Press <Key/> to return to the plugin
translation.warning_message: <Key1/> Note that the keys and the touch screen will continue to work
translation.error_hotkey_message: <Key1/> Hotkeys are broken in all plugins due to a SteamOS update. No solution yet, hotkeys remain disabled.
